mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS SUR_NUM ,SUR_ID ,USER_ID ,SUR_TITLE ,SUR_START_DT ,SUR_END_DT ,SUR_DEL_YN ,SUR_LOGIN_YN FROM TB_SURVEY WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN SUR_START_DT AND SUR_END_DT ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT SUR_ID ,USER_ID ,SUR_TITLE ,SUR_FIRST_DT ,SUR_MOD_DT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUR_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUR_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUR_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YY-MM-DD"("DY")"') AS STARTDAY ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUR_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YY-MM-DD"("DY")"') AS ENDDAY ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUR_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + INTERVAL '3' DAY, 'YY-MM-DD"("DY")"') AS ENDDAY_RESULT ,TRUNC(TO_DATE(SUR_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(SUR_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + 1) AS DT ,SUR_DEL_YN ,SUR_LOGIN_YN ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_QUESTION B WHERE B.SUR_ID = SUR_ID AND B.QUE_PAR_ID IS NULL) AS SUR_CNT ,SUR_SUBMIT_CNT FROM TB_SURVEY WHERE SUR_ID = #{sur_id}

SELECT COUNT(QUE_ID) FROM ( SELECT A.SUR_ID ,A.QUE_ID ,A.CATE_ID ,A.QUE_CONTENT ,A.QUE_TYPE ,A.QUE_PAR_ID ,A.QUE_DT ,A.QUE_UP_DT ,A.QUE_DEL_YN ,A.QUE_PAGE_NUM ,A.QUE_ESS_TYPE FROM TB_QUESTION A WHERE A.QUE_ESS_TYPE = 'Y' START WITH QUE_PAR_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.QUE_ID = A.QUE_PAR_ID ) WHERE SUR_ID = #{sur_id}

SELECT ROWNUM AS QUE_ROW ,A.SUR_ID ,A.QUE_ID ,A.CATE_ID ,A.QUE_NUM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.QUE_PAR_ID ORDER BY A.QUE_ID ASC) AS Q_RNK ,A.QUE_CONTENT ,A.QUE_TYPE ,A.QUE_PAR_ID ,A.QUE_DT ,A.QUE_UP_DT ,A.QUE_DEL_YN ,A.QUE_ESS_TYPE ,A.QUE_ESS_VISIBLE ,A.QUE_MIN_TYPE ,A.QUE_MAX_TYPE ,A.QUE_PAGE_NUM FROM TB_QUESTION A WHERE A.SUR_ID = #{sur_id} ORDER BY A.QUE_ID ASC
SELECT MAX(QUE_PAGE_NUM) AS LAST_PAGE_NUM FROM TB_QUESTION WHERE SUR_ID = #{sur_id}
SELECT A.ANS_SEQ ,A.QUE_ID ,A.OPTION_ID ,A.USER_ID ,A.ANS_CON ,A.ANS_ETC_CON ,A.ANS_DT ,A.ANS_UP_DT ,A.ANS_UP_USER_ID ,A.SUR_ID FROM TB_ANSWER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND A.SUR_ID = #{sur_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ANSWER ( ANS_SEQ, QUE_ID, SUR_ID, OPTION_ID, USER_ID, ANS_CON, ANS_DT, ANS_ETC_CON ) values ( SEQ_ANS.NEXTVAL, #{que_id}, #{sur_id}, #{option_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ans_con, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{ans_etc_con, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
